alert.note: Alert for Northern Monterey Bay (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued February 22 at 5:10AM PST until February 22 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Breaking waves of 8 to 12 feet expected. * WHERE...Northern Monterey Bay. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Dangerous swimming and surfing conditions and localized beach erosion. Large waves can sweep across the beach without warning, pulling people into the sea from rocks, jetties, and beaches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Large northwest waves will peak Wednesday morning. Northwest facing beaches are most at risk for large turbulent shore break and strong currents.
info.instruction: Remain out of the water to avoid hazardous swimming conditions.
